page.title: 02MERYLS FAVOURITE DRINK IS...
page.content: Meryl's favourite drink is Ribena. She thinks school is a bit good. She goes to Cornwall for her holidays. Her favourite programme she watches at school is "Look and Read." She likes her school playground. Meryl likes to watch Sherlock Holmes. Her teacher's name is Mrs Davies. She has got lots of friends at school and where she lives. She has Rice Krispies for breakfast. Meryl stays to school dinner every day. She has not got a computer at home. At home she likes sticking cardboard together to make robots. Her school is nice for all kinds of ages. {Andrew age 7 Andrew lives in Gullywood. He likes where he lives. He stays for lunch.
